dict.acceptation: 狡猾的；（形势、工作等）复杂的；机警的；微妙的；

sent.orig: It's a tricky, high path; it's best we look for a guide.
sent.trans: 山高路险，我们最好找一位向导。

sent.orig: She showed great tact in dealing with a tricky situation.
sent.trans: 她处理棘手的局面表现得十分老练。

sent.orig: This part is a bit tricky to understand.
KR: Like I said it is a bit more tricky in some areas.
sent.trans: 就向我说过的，在有些领域比以往更需要一些技巧。

sent.orig: It was a tricky experiment-he had to have on eye on the thermometer all the time.
sent.trans: 这是一项复杂棘手的试验，他得从头到尾边试验边观察温度计。
